== Pallippuram (627994) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Pallippuram is a village in the [[Kochi]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 1152 hectares and harbouring 8056 households with total population of 32321 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Paravur]] is at a distance of 6 km. Male population is 15866 and female population is 16455. Scheduled Caste Population is 3331 and Scheduled Tribes population is 87. Census Location Code of the village is 627994<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 28802 (89.11%)
* Literate male population: 14212 (89.58%)
* Literate female population: 14590 (88.67%)
